data.text: Blessed is the man that doeth this,
Neither let the son of the stranger, that hath joined himself to the Lord, speak, saying,
For thus saith the Lord unto the eunuchs that keep my sabbaths,
Even unto them will I give in mine house and within my walls
Also the sons of the stranger, that join themselves to the Lord,
Even them will I bring to my holy mountain,
The Lord God which gathereth the outcasts of Israel saith,
All ye beasts of the field, come to devour,
His watchmen are blind: they are all ignorant,
Yea, they are greedy dogs which can never have enough,
Come ye, say they, I will fetch wine,
